duties_responsibilities.duty: Data entry for purchase orders, ensuring purchasing documents are complete and accurate and include appropriate and reasonable terms and conditions.
Managing inventory, including current stock and new deliveries, ensuring the accuracy of purchase orders, including all related instructions.
Answering phone calls and performing other related duties as assigned.

Purchasing goods and services according to company policies and procedures, searching for and negotiating contracts with suppliers and manufacturers, building and maintaining supplier relationships, and evaluating vendors based on price, reliability, capability, and previous transaction history.

Finding new suppliers, negotiating volume and cash transaction discounts, and other available discounts, presenting purchasing report to management, developing an effective and accurate system for monitoring purchase orders, and solving supply chain problems.
